text: Mitchell Seidenfeld (born 18 March 1963) is a former American para table tennis player. His son, Ian Seidenfeld, is a table tennis player. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Minnesota Category:People from Lakeville, Minnesota Category:Paralympic table tennis players of the United States Category:Medalists at the 1992 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Table tennis players at the 1992 Summer Paralympics Category:Table tennis players at the 1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Table tennis players at the 2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in table tennis Category:Paralympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Paralympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for the United States
title: Mitchell Seidenfeld
